topic.title: REFERRING CARE PROFESSIONAL TYPE FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE STANDARD
topic.shortdesc: The type of CARE PROFESSIONAL who carried out the NHS Continuing Healthcare Checklist and referred the PATIENT for an NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard) assessment.
